languages.text: {n}Старик походит на высушенный фрукт, пятнистый и сморщенный. Истертая деревянная аквила на груди проглядывает из-под его прохудившейся рубахи, а дрожащие худые пальцы то и дело перепроверяют, не проскользнула ли меж них заветная потертая бумажка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Старик походит на высушенный фрукт, пятнистый и сморщенный. Истертая деревянная аквила на груди проглядывает из-под его прохудившейся рубахи, а дрожащие худые пальцы то и дело перепроверяют, не проскользнула ли меж них заветная потертая бумажка.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}The old man resembles a dried fruit, mottled and wizened. A worn wooden Aquila on his chest peeks out from under his tattered shirt, and his withered, shaking fingers are constantly checking that his precious paper has not slipped from his grasp.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Старик походит на высушенный фрукт, пятнистый и сморщенный. Истертая деревянная аквила на груди проглядывает из-под его прохудившейся рубахи, а дрожащие худые пальцы то и дело перепроверяют, не проскользнула ли меж них заветная потертая бумажка.{/n}

traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}这个老人看起来就像一颗干瘪的水果一样斑驳而枯萎。他胸前破旧的木质双头鹰吊坠从破烂的衬衫下露了出来，枯萎的手指不住地颤抖着，检查他那张宝贵的文件有没有从手中滑落。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man resembles a dried fruit, mottled and wizened. A worn wooden Aquila on his chest peeks out from under his tattered shirt, and his withered, shaking fingers are constantly checking that his precious paper has not slipped from his grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个老人看起来就像一颗干瘪的水果一样斑驳而枯萎。他胸前破旧的木质双头鹰吊坠从破烂的衬衫下露了出来，枯萎的手指不住地颤抖着，检查他那张宝贵的文件有没有从手中滑落。{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}El anciano recuerda a una fruta deshidratada, moteado y arrugado. Un Aquila de madera desgastada asoma en su pecho a través de los jirones de su camisa, y sus dedos marchitos y temblorosos comprueban constantemente que su preciado papel no haya escapado de su agarre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man resembles a dried fruit, mottled and wizened. A worn wooden Aquila on his chest peeks out from under his tattered shirt, and his withered, shaking fingers are constantly checking that his precious paper has not slipped from his grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano recuerda a una fruta deshidratada, moteado y arrugado. Un Aquila de madera desgastada asoma en su pecho a través de los jirones de su camisa, y sus dedos marchitos y temblorosos comprueban constantemente que su preciado papel no haya escapado de su agarre.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}老人はシミとシワだらけで、まるでドライフルーツのようだ。胸元を見ると、ぼろぼろのシャツの下からすり減った木製アクィラがちらりと見えた。しわくちゃの震える指は、大切な紙がその手の中から滑り落ちていないかをしきりに確かめている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man resembles a dried fruit, mottled and wizened. A worn wooden Aquila on his chest peeks out from under his tattered shirt, and his withered, shaking fingers are constantly checking that his precious paper has not slipped from his grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人はシミとシワだらけで、まるでドライフルーツのようだ。胸元を見ると、ぼろぼろのシャツの下からすり減った木製アクィラがちらりと見えた。しわくちゃの震える指は、大切な紙がその手の中から滑り落ちていないかをしきりに確かめている。{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}L'homme à la peau tachetée et flétrie ressemble à un vieux pruneau. Sur sa poitrine, un Aquila en bois usé dépasse du col de sa chemise élimée et ses mains ridées, agitées de tremblements, vérifient constamment que son précieux document ne lui a pas échappé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man resembles a dried fruit, mottled and wizened. A worn wooden Aquila on his chest peeks out from under his tattered shirt, and his withered, shaking fingers are constantly checking that his precious paper has not slipped from his grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme à la peau tachetée et flétrie ressemble à un vieux pruneau. Sur sa poitrine, un Aquila en bois usé dépasse du col de sa chemise élimée et ses mains ridées, agitées de tremblements, vérifient constamment que son précieux document ne lui a pas échappé.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann erinnert an Trockenobst, blass und schrumpelig. Unter seinem zerrissenen Hemd blitzt ein abgegriffener Adler aus Holz hervor, und seine faltigen, zitternden Finger prüfen ständig, dass sein wertvolles Formular nicht seinem Griff entglitten ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man resembles a dried fruit, mottled and wizened. A worn wooden Aquila on his chest peeks out from under his tattered shirt, and his withered, shaking fingers are constantly checking that his precious paper has not slipped from his grasp.{/n}

traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Pörsümüş cildinin rengi yer yer değişen ihtiyar, bir tür meyve kurusunu andırıyor. Göğsündeki yıpranmış, ahşaptan Çift Başlı Kartal; yırtıp pırtık gömleğinin yakasından kendini belli ediyor. Buruşuk ve titrek parmakları, sürekli elindeki kıymetli kâğıdı düşürüp düşürmediğini kontrol ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man resembles a dried fruit, mottled and wizened. A worn wooden Aquila on his chest peeks out from under his tattered shirt, and his withered, shaking fingers are constantly checking that his precious paper has not slipped from his grasp.{/n}

Buruşuk ve titrek parmakları, sürekli elindeki kıymetli kâğıdı düşürüp düşürmediğini kontrol ediyor.{/n}
